golden_diagnosis: 尼曼匹克病B型/Niemann-Pick disease type B; NPD-B/Chronic visceral acid sphingomyelinase deficiency/Niemann-pick disease, type B,尼曼匹克病B型/Niemann-Pick disease type B; NPD-B/Chronic visceral acid sphingomyelinase deficiency/Niemann-pick disease, type B,尼曼匹克病B型/Niemann-Pick disease type B; NPD-B/Chronic visceral acid sphingomyelinase deficiency/Niemann-pick disease, type B,尼曼匹克病C型/Niemann-Pick disease type C; NPD-C/Niemann-Pick disease type C/Niemann-pick disease, type C1,尼曼匹克病C型/Niemann-Pick disease type C; NPD-C/Niemann-Pick disease type C/Niemann-pick disease, type C1,尼曼匹克病C型/Niemann-Pick disease type C; NPD-C/Niemann-Pick disease type C/Niemann-pick disease, type C1,Niemann-pick disease, type C2,尼曼匹克病A型/Niemann-Pick disease type A; NPD-A/Niemann-Pick disease, type A,尼曼匹克病A型/Niemann-Pick disease type A; NPD-A/Niemann-Pick disease, type A
predict_diagnosis:
1. Neurodegenerative disorders and primary neurogenetic disorders such as Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis, Frontotemporal Dementia, Neonal Marfan syndrome, and Brugada syndrome.
2. Neuromuscular disorders such as Muscular Atrophy, Muscular Dystrophy, and myopathic neuropathy.
3. Neuroinfectious disorders such as Viral encephalitis, Meningitis, and myelitis.
4. Systemic autoimmune disorders such as Systemic Lupus Erythematosus, Hashimoto's thyroiditis, and Multiple Sclerosis.
5. Metabolic disorders such as Hepatitis C, Hemolytic Uremic Syndrome, and Kidney Disease.
6. Endocrine disorders such as Cushing's Syndrome, Adrenal Insufficiency, and Insulinoma.
7. Inorganic poisoning, particularly metal poisoning such as Mercury and Lead poisoning, and Organophosphorus toxicity.
8. Paraneoplastic syndrome due to neuroendocrine carcinoma or other malignancies.
9. Hematologic disorders such as Hemophilia, Leukemia, Lymphoma, and Hemolytic uremic syndrome.
10. Trauma and injury, including spinal cord injury, head injury, and gastrointestinal injury.
